room_title: Escape room "The Candy Shop" by Expedition Escape in Montgomeryville
room_description: At the reading of your grandfather's will, you learn that you've inherited his candy shop known for its unique chocolate. The recipe was always kept a secret, but you have to find out the ingredients if you want to keep the business. Grandpa has left clues throughout the shop. Discover the secret recipe which may be your ticket to escape!
